name: MapifyLite (by MapifyPro)
author: MapifyPro

sections.description:
MapifyLite is an elite plugin for WordPress that implements fully-customized maps on your site.

With buttery-smooth maps, enhanced graphics and pop-up galleries, MapifyLite is perfect for creating a store locator, journals, and more! Seamlessly upgrade to MapifyPro to enable routes, tours, custom maps, and faster 3D vector maps.
sections.installation:
1. Click Install, then click Activate.

  2. Maps: Add your map

  3. Map Locations: Add and edit locations to maps as needed. Or install MapifyPro for bulk uploading using a CSV file from Excel.
sections.faq:
Documentation

Support and Knowledge Base
sections.changelog:
5.1.0

  • Fixed a PHP 8.2 warning message: “Deprecated: Creation of dynamic property … is deprecated.”
  • Updated Advanced Custom Fields (ACF) library within MapifyLite plugin from version 5.9.5 to 6.3.0
  • Tested up to WordPress 6.5.4 and PHP 8.2

5.0.1

  • Fixed and improved the Mapify map tiles uploader
  • Fixed the “Mapify is not defined” issue because of the JS script minification (tested with the Autoptimize plugin)
  • Fixed the “Mapify is not defined” issue reported in certain servers
  • Tested on WordPress version 6.5

4.3.4

  • Tested on WordPress version 6.1
  • Updated Installation instructions

4.3.3

  • Added suggestion to review
  • Tested on WordPress version 6.0

4.3.1

  • Added build-in MapifyPro installer

4.3.0

  • Prevent plugin conflict with MapifyPro
  • Minor fixes to the carousel
  • Fixed updater bug
  • Fixed thumbnail size of the image carousel

4.2.9

  • Updated map location’s image carousel with new design and improvements
  • Reduced pin’s tooltip load time
  • Fixed the map location’s “not found” issue after plugin activation
  • Tested on WordPress version 5.9

4.2.8

  • Fixed bug: tooltip got centered on pin’s hover
  • Fixed the js variable layers conflict
  • Removed grayscale map style, due to the server issue

4.2.0

  • Version bump

4.1.0

  • Various bug fixes
  • Tested up to WordPress 5.8

4.0.0

  • Major custom-fields update from Carbon Fields to ACF
  • Initial plugin release on WordPress.org
